channel.title: themes on Emre Koca Blog
channel.description: Recent content in themes on Emre Koca Blog

item.title: Getting Started with Nmap: A Beginner's Guide
item.description: Nmap Nmap (Network Mapper) is a powerful network scanning tool that can be used for a variety of purposes such as network inventory, vulnerability scanning, and network mapping. In this article, we’ll take a closer look at how to use Nmap and explore its different features. Installation The first step is to install Nmap on your system. Nmap is available for different operating systems such as Windows, Linux, and macOS. You can download the latest version of Nmap from the official website or install it using your operating system’s package manager.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
